post.content:
Job Profile  
Advertisement number: 294082
Title: Systems intergration engineer - software (CRM software implementation) (NOC: 2173)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time
Salary: To be negotiated
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto Centre, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Other: Experience working with multiple CRM software applications.
Experience: 3 - 5 years, Other: Knowledge of leading CRM software. Experience implementing CRM.
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English

Employer: Confidential

How to Apply:  By E-mail: ma0012003@yahoo.ca

Advertised until: 2003/04/30
post.title: Systems intergration engineer - software
